com.bitplane.xt

Class DatasetCalibration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bitplane.xt.DatasetCalibration

  • public class DatasetCalibration
extends Object
    Calibration (voxel size and unit) and min coordinate for an ImarisDataset.

    Note, that the min coordinate is in ImgLib2 convention: It refers to the voxel center. This is in contrast to Imaris conventions, where ExtendMinX, ExtendMinY, ExtendMinZ indicate the min corner of the min voxel.

    When reading/writing extents from/to a IDataSetPrx, the min is translated appropriately from/to Imaris conventions.

    Author:
    Tobias Pietzsch
